fr.lri.swingstates.sm.transitions

Class KeyRelease

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lri.swingstates.sm.Transition
      • fr.lri.swingstates.sm.transitions.KeyTransition
        • fr.lri.swingstates.sm.transitions.KeyRelease

  • public class KeyRelease
extends KeyTransition
    A transition triggered by a key released event. Keys can be specified either by the ASCII character they represent or by their keycode.
    Author:
    Caroline Appert

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyRelease()
      Builds a transition triggered by a key released event with any modifier that loops on the current state.

      Builds a transition triggered by a key released event with any modifier that loops on the current state.

      Builds a transition triggered by a key released event with any modifier that loops on the current state.

      Builds a transition triggered by a key released event with any modifier.

      Builds a transition triggered by a key released event with any modifier.
